languages.text: {n}Выставив по два десятка мудрецов, два культа попытались прийти к общему пониманию пути святого Когнация. Пусть они и не смогли достичь догматического единства, но смогли договориться о том, как жить на одном мире.{/n}

{n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Выставив по два десятка мудрецов, два культа попытались прийти к общему пониманию пути святого Когнация. Пусть они и не смогли достичь догматического единства, но смогли договориться о том, как жить на одном мире.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Putting out two dozens of wise men from each side, the two cults have tried to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may have not come to the dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to coexist on one world.{/n}

{n}Putting out two dozens of wise men from each side, the two cults have tried to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may have not come to the dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to coexist on one world.{/n}

{n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}

{n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}

{n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}

{n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}

languages.text: {n}双方教派各派出了二十几位智者，试图找到对圣科尼亚蒂乌斯之道的共同解释。他们或许并没有达成统一的教条，但至少设法找到了在同一个世界上共存的方式。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}双方教派各派出了二十几位智者，试图找到对圣科尼亚蒂乌斯之道的共同解释。他们或许并没有达成统一的教条，但至少设法找到了在同一个世界上共存的方式。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Poniendo dos docenas de sabios de cada lado, los dos cultos han tratado de encontrar una interpretación común del camino de san Cognatius. Puede que no hayan logrado la unidad dogmática, pero al menos han conseguido encontrar una forma de coexistir en el mismo mundo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Poniendo dos docenas de sabios de cada lado, los dos cultos han tratado de encontrar una interpretación común del camino de san Cognatius. Puede que no hayan logrado la unidad dogmática, pero al menos han conseguido encontrar una forma de coexistir en el mismo mundo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}2つの魔女団は、それぞれ20数人の賢者を輩出し、聖コグナティウスの道について共通の解釈を見出そうとしてきた。教条での統一を得ることはできなかったかもしれないが、少なくとも同じ惑星で共存する方法を見つけることはできた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}2つの魔女団は、それぞれ20数人の賢者を輩出し、聖コグナティウスの道について共通の解釈を見出そうとしてきた。教条での統一を得ることはできなかったかもしれないが、少なくとも同じ惑星で共存する方法を見つけることはできた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ayant envoyé deux douzaines de leurs plus grands sages, les deux cultes s'attellent à une interprétation commune de la voie de Saint Cognatius. S'ils ne parviennent pas à atteindre de véritable unité dogmatique, ils réussissent au moins à trouver comment coexister sur le même monde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ayant envoyé deux douzaines de leurs plus grands sages, les deux cultes s'attellent à une interprétation commune de la voie de Saint Cognatius. S'ils ne parviennent pas à atteindre de véritable unité dogmatique, ils réussissent au moins à trouver comment coexister sur le même monde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die zwei Kulte schickten jeweils zwei Dutzend weise Männer von jeder Seite, um eine gemeinsame Deutung der Lehre des Heiligen Cognatius zu finden. Sie haben zwar keine dogmatische Einheit erreicht, aber zumindest einen Weg gefunden, auf derselben Welt zu koexistieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die zwei Kulte schickten jeweils zwei Dutzend weise Männer von jeder Seite, um eine gemeinsame Deutung der Lehre des Heiligen Cognatius zu finden. Sie haben zwar keine dogmatische Einheit erreicht, aber zumindest einen Weg gefunden, auf derselben Welt zu koexistieren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İki tarikat, her iki taraftan da yirmi civarında âlimin öne çıkmasıyla birlikte Aziz Cognatius'un öğretilerinin ortak bir yorumunu bulmanın yollarını aradı. Dogmatik bir birliğe erişemeseler de en azından aynı dünyada birlikte yaşamanın bir yolunu bulabildiler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Putting forth two dozen wise men from each side, the two cults have sought to find a common interpretation of the way of Saint Cognatius. They may not have achieved dogmatic unity, but they have at least managed to find a way to coexist on the same world.{/n}
